Our Story

Discover the passion behind Nature Retreat

Since 2010

Founded by eco-enthusiasts Sarah and Mark, Nature Retreat began as a dream to create a sustainable sanctuary where guests could reconnect with nature without sacrificing comfort.

Our 20-acre property is powered entirely by renewable energy, and we partner with local conservation initiatives to protect the surrounding wildlife.
